attributes.comment:
I am writing in response to the proposal of the increase in prices for the I171H
Home and Land Immigration Form. We who are involved in the middle of an
adoption process are having to pay this double pricing due to the expiration
dates. I am pleading that would you reconsider not raising the pricing as well as
please extend the expiration dates on the form and fingerprinting process.
Adoption is very expensive in itself, why does the Home / Land / Immigration
Security have to be so hard and financially draining upon us? Especially when my
husband is in the military and has a top secret permit. Please reconsider.
Sincerely,
Jamie Langley
attributes.title: Comment Submitted Jamie Langley
